system.description: The smite damage becomes force damage and the target must make a Charisma saving throw against your spell save DC or be teleported to an open space of your choice within 10 feet and stunned until the end of its next turn. A creature that succeeds is slowed until the end of its next turn, but is not teleported or stunned.

source.name: Thematic Toolkit: Judge, Jury, and Executioner
